amendment.description: To empower States with authority for most taxing and spending for highway programs and mass transit programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 3584 proposed by Senator Lee.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3584, under the order of 7/23/2014, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 28 - 69. Record Vote Number: 246.
